settings.html: We are a company with a really big heart, a love of modern style, and an insatiable penchant for fun, and flair. Cheers and welcome to the Social!

settings.content: Our new performance fabrics are made to withstand all that life can throw your way. Kids, pets, and even spilled red wine.

settings.heading: Putting the fun in furniture.
settings.description: Family Owned and Family Operated for almost 40 Years.

settings.heading: Welcome to the Social!
settings.description: We are a furniture company with a really big heart, a love of modern style, and an insatiable penchant for fun, and flair! Founded in August 2011 with six originally designed bar carts, Society Social continues to design and produce small but edited collections of unique furniture built in-house. With entertaining at the heart of our business, we truly believe you and your home should always be well equipped to celebrate. Cheers!

settings.heading: Furniture is our legacy, quality is our priority.
settings.description:
Literally raised in her family’s furniture factory, founder Roxy Te, grew up learning the ins and outs of creating exceptional pieces. Society Social is proud to continue the nearly 40 year tradition of creating quality furnishings available at friendly prices. Our privately owned family factories in Cebu, Philippines and Conover, North Carolina have been manufacturing since the early ’80s and are vertically integrated, allowing us to achieve the best in quality, design and product without taking a large retail markup.

We’ve manufactured for large US retailers, hospitality accounts and worked in conjunction with design teams to develop many private label and licensed collections. We have capabilities to work with metals, natural materials, synthetic outdoor materials and more. Each collection is a group effort by Roxy’s family and the factories Society Social works hard to support.

settings.heading: Our one-of-a-kind designs.
settings.description: Handmade by our team of artisans and craftsmen, our designs include NC upholstery, casegoods, and occasional furniture from textured raffia tables, to faux bamboo bar carts, and rattan and cane mirrors. Our designs are thought up in-house and are entirely original to our business. We pride ourselves on unique designs that are not mass produced and we strive to offer a designer look at an accessible price point. We make it our personal goal to only deliver the best in quality, design, and craftsmanship. All of our designs are custom finished or made to order, so go ahead and customize to your heart’s desire!

settings.heading: ROXY’S PICKS
settings.description:
“This is a callout
quote from Roxy
or other team
members.”
settings.name: — ROXY, FOUNDER & DESIGNER

settings.ba_txt: Exclusive perks for the design professional
settings.txt_img: Custom is the name of our game which means WE’RE YOUR NEW  BEST FRIEND. Hello!
settings.mid_heading: As part of our design program, you’ll enjoy:
settings.mid_description:
• 20% to 25% off retail prices year round
  • First looks at new collections
  • Access to our full swatch handles plus COM
  • 1500 color finishes or Benjamin Moore and Sherwin Williams color matching
  • 40+ fabric options always handpicked by our team from the latest fabric markets
  • Unique designs produced in small batches you won't find anywhere else

settings.heading: SHIPPING & LEAD TIMES
settings.description: All orders ship out of our North Carolina factory. Due to the handmade nature of our products, production & shipping lead times vary per piece. For accurate lead times, please reference the “Shipping” tab on each individual product page. As soon as your order ships, you will receive a shipping confirmation email with delivery information included. We do not offer international shipping at this time.

FEDEX:
Small accessories such as lamps, rugs, trays, bar carts, etc will ship via FedEx. A tracking number will be provided in your shipping confirmation email. Orders shipping via FedEx typically deliver in a few business days. Please note, a signature may be required upon delivery.

WHITE GLOVE DELIVERY:
Furniture (sofas, lounge chairs, multi-item orders too large to ship via regular mail) will be delivered via White Glove Delivery service. Items shipping via White Glove Delivery will be brought into your home, placed into the room of your choice, unpacked and all packaging will be removed. Because of this specialized service, please allow approximately 2-4 weeks for delivery depending on your location. Prior to delivery, you will receive a phone call from the delivery team to coordinate your delivery date + time window. The delivery will not be carried out unless the date has been confirmed by you. Please note, if you miss your confirmed and scheduled delivery, you will be responsible for a redelivery fee which is set by the delivery company.

settings.heading: DAMAGES
settings.description: At Society Social, we make it our personal goal to only deliver the best in quality, design, and craftsmanship. Your custom Society Social is inspected at each stage of production and must pass a final inspection before we release it for shipping. Although rare, transit damage can occur. Please be sure to follow the below steps:

For FEDEX or USPS deliveries, please make sure to inspect your order upon receipt and notify us of any damages within 24 hours. Please take a photo of the damaged product as well as the box and email our team for review. Please hold on to all packaging. Our team will be in touch asap with next steps.

For WHITE GLOVE DELIVERIES, please fully inspect your order while the delivery team is present and make a note of any freight damages on their paperwork. If we are not notified within 24 hours and if damages are not noted on the paperwork a claim will not be honored.

settings.heading: RETURNS
settings.description: The majority of our items are custom made or finished to order and are final sale. Please reference the “Return” page on the individual product page for accurate information. If an item is eligible for a return, please note you will be responsible for the return shipping charges, the outbound shipping charges and a restocking fee.

settings.heading: Custom Upholstery
settings.description:
As we offer a variety of fabric offerings for our custom upholstery collection, please reference the cleaning + care instructions found on the back of your fabric sample. If you have any questions please do not hesitate to reach out to our team!

Although we are heavy on performance fabrics, we do offer a few non-performance linen and twills. We highly recommend sourcing a fabric protector to keep your custom SS in it’s best shape! We’ve used Forcefield Fabric Protector with success and it makes basic linens + twills liquid resistant. With that said, we highly recommend testing the protector on a small portion of your piece as we cannot advise as to how it will react to all fabric offerings.

settings.heading: Natural & Hand-Dyed Grasscloth
settings.description:
Although our raffia is coated with a protective finish, it’s a good idea to be mindful of the material. Like any natural material, similar to fabric, grasscloth can be subject to fading/discoloration when exposed to direct sunlight for extended periods of time. Water and other liquids can also cause damage. We recommend sourcing a UV glass top to keep your grasscloth in its best shape over time! Grasscloth is a natural and handmade product and variations in color and texture are standard. These variations are not defects but are what add to the character of the material.

Regarding spills, like any wood or natural material, the finish can be damaged when spills are not wiped up in a timely manner. Do not leave sitting liquids! Do not use harsh chemicals to clean this piece! Simply use a damp washcloth and mild dish soap, like Dawn, to clean.

settings.heading: Color Collection Pieces
settings.description:
As an environmentally friendly brand, we’ve intentionally chosen water-based painted finishes vs lacquered, oil-based finishes. Although lacquered finishes are known to be more durable, they are not only much more costly but also highly toxic and bad for the environment. Choosing water-based finishes is also what allows us to offer a wide range of colors while keeping prices accessible for what is traditionally a very high end category. Our painted pieces are given two coats of VOC free, non-toxic, exterior and furniture grade paint. With that said, painted furniture is not indestructible— accidents can happen in transit and at home with you. A bottle of touch-up is sent out with each order to keep your piece looking fresh and at its best!

Regarding spills, like any wood or natural material, the finish can be damaged when spills are not wiped up in a timely manner. Do not leave sitting liquids! Do not use harsh chemicals to clean this piece! Simply use a damp washcloth and mild dish soap, like Dawn, to clean. Please note, our color collection pieces are for indoor use only.

settings.heading: Bar Carts
settings.description: We handcraft our bar carts one at a time for their end use— entertaining! Due to the function of the piece, we take great care in finishing each bar cart with a protective top coat to safeguard against liquid spills which if wiped up in a timely manner will not stain. With that said, like any wood or natural material, this piece can be subject to water damage if exposed to moisture for an extended period of time. Our bar carts are for indoor use only. Society Social is not responsible for damages caused by misuse or improper cleaning.

settings.heading: We offer a wide variety of fabrics in an array of textures and colors, all available on our custom upholstery collection.
settings.description:
Grade pricing per piece can be viewed on each individual product page. We want designing your own unique look to be easy and fun! We’re always happy to help you make decisions, which is why we offer up to 10 swatches for $5. If you decide to order, we’ll
take the difference off your purchase.
